metadata.title: CVE-2020-14326 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in RESTEasy, where RootNode incorrectly caches routes. This issue results in hash flooding, leading to slower requests with higher CPU time spent searching and adding the entry. This flaw allows an attacker to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: resteasy package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
resteasy3.0 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
